comments.creator: bas@basschouten.com
comments.text: The Azure D2D backend ignores the transform on clearRect. This means that a ClearRect executed on the canvas after a transform was set behaves incorrectly.
comments.author: bas@basschouten.com
comments.raw_text: The Azure D2D backend ignores the transform on clearRect. This means that a ClearRect executed on the canvas after a transform was set behaves incorrectly.

comments.creator: stefankienzle.de@gmail.com
comments.author: stefankienzle.de@gmail.com
comments.text: I think this is fixed since FF 27.
comments.raw_text: I think this is fixed since FF 27.
